sub_topic: Predicting the solubility of inorganic salts in water
message_1: What is the solubility of calcium sulfate (CaSO4) in water at 25°C?
message_2: The solubility of calcium sulfate (CaSO4) in water at 25°C is approximately 2.4 grams per liter (g/L). This value may vary slightly depending on the specific conditions and the purity of the substances involved.
